name: sarcomatoid transitional cell carcinoma
definition: A transitional cell carcinoma that has sarcoma-like components arising from the malignant transitional epithelium. [url:http\://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0090429505013439, url:http\://www.tua.org.tw/magazine/FileM/dw2008331112526_10734.pdf]

clinicalTrials.title: Cabozantinib in Combination With Nivolumab and Ipilimumab in Rare Genitourinary Tumors
